_header: The blessed Bairn in Bethlehem born
_description: The Abbot and the Child, a miracle of the Virgin Mary — in 8-line stanzas

BLHar2380.First Lines:
Þe blessed Barne In betlem BornÞat with Is blod full dere
                    vs bought…
BLHar2380.Last Lines:
…I ffor…of all þi……ffellow I prayd for
                    þeÞat þou…

Tryon,  Ruth Wilson. 
             “Miracles of Our Lady in Middle English Verse.” 
             PMLA
         38 (1923): 308-81: 378-88.
